casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: J.A.M. No. 7PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Jasmine. Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith S. Smith, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Caroline P. Mackie, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for GAL. Jacob E. Setzer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Moses, Travis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of January 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
